title: Riverside Hotel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Take-out
description: Serving seasonal dinners May through October F-M 4-8pm. Call for special dietary requests or to book group reservations during the week. Dinner is all you care to eat soup, salad, bread, dessert and a non alcoholic drink. Menu changes daily. Front porch seating along the Youghiogheny River available.
